name: banaag_website
author: Waken Maclang, Dave Shanna Gigawin, Allan Tagle, & Jeff Ronyl Pausal
description: 1) Paste the .env file to your root folder (Banaag_Website) 2) Head to the Banaag_Website directory in your terminal  3) Run "npm start" 4) Copy and paste the local host link provided to your browser.
